existing_features.title: After publishing the current build live on the Internet Computer, provide the live production URL as a user-facing link that can be copied.
Add an in-app share surface (e.g., in Settings/About) that displays a QR code encoding the live production URL and allows downloading the QR as an image.

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide a deployment link and generate a QR code for the live version

projectName: Provide live deployment link and shareable QR code
